items.content_html: Developed a lightweight server application that allows users to upload files securely and efficiently using file system (fs) streams or through API endpoints. The system ensures optimal performance by handling large file uploads without memory overload, leveraging Node.js stream capabilities for direct file writing and storage.
items.title: TejasSShinde/UploadFile: Developed a lightweight server application that allows users to upload files securely and efficiently using file system (fs) streams or through API endpoints. The system ensures optimal performance by handling large file uploads without memory overload, leveraging Node.js stream capabilities for direct file writing and storage.

items.content_html: Froovo is a modern, modular, ultra-lightweight web server written in TypeScript. Designed to deliver exceptional performance with a clean and flexible framework, it is ideal for modern APIs, real-time services and high-performance web applications.

items.content_html: This project is a backend + frontend implementation of a mini social network built using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, following a microservices architecture. The project also includes a lightweight React frontend to interact with the services.

The project also includes a lightweight React frontend to interact with the services.

items.title: AdarshHatkar/tsc-path-fix: Zero-runtime TypeScript path resolver - converts aliases to relative paths at compile time. Fast, lightweight, with native watch mode.

items.content_html: A lightweight and robust CalDAV client for Node.js applications, written in TypeScript. This library enables seamless integration with CalDAV servers to manage calendars, events, and tasks.
items.title: KlautNet/ts-caldav: A lightweight and robust CalDAV client for Node.js applications, written in TypeScript. This library enables seamless integration with CalDAV servers to manage calendars, events, and tasks.

items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive Kanban board application built with React, Redux Toolkit, and react-beautiful-dnd. This project provides a Trello-like task management interface with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for organizing workflow and tracking project progress.

items.content_html: A lightweight, file-based caching library designed for Node.js applications. It provides flexible caching with optional compression, expiration handling, and keyword search capabilities. The library is easy to use and integrates seamlessly into modern applications
items.title: knfs-library/bamimi-cache: A lightweight, file-based caching library designed for Node.js applications. items.content_html: Liko is a simple, fast, and lightweight H5 render framework by typescript. Liko is a high-performance rendering engine based on WebGPU, designed for AI. Liko can be used for games, H5 applications, and interactive interactions.
items.title: letmaker/liko: Liko is a simple, fast, and lightweight H5 render framework by typescript.  Liko is a high-performance rendering engine based on WebGPU, designed for AI.  Liko can be used for games, H5 applications, and interactive interactions.

items.content_html: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
